# Yuto Tachibana (立花 優斗)

> Software Engineer based in Tokyo, Japan. Personal profile and link collection.

## About

Yuto Tachibana began his career in 2018 at NTT COMWARE, where he was engaged in new businesses with cutting-edge technologies for government agencies. Then he joined several startups as an engineering manager or the head of development, where he had led 0-to-1 product creation, organizational building, and growth initiatives. In 2022, he became the tech lead and contributed to business development at a newly established joint venture of DeNA. In 2025, Yuto joined Delight Ventures. Now he serves as a temporary CTO for portfolio companies, providing support for value creation and implementing AI solutions for fund management.

## Current Positions

### Full-time
- Delight Ventures, Inc. - https://www.delight-ventures.com/en/team/yuto-tachibana

### Contract / Advisor
- Algomatic Co., Ltd. - https://algomatic.jp/company
- Workside, Inc. - https://onn-hr.com/aboutus
- Kazetuchi Inc. - https://kztc.jp/

## Data Format

This site's profile data is available in structured JSON format at:
- https://tachibanayu24.com/me.json

The JSON schema is defined at:
- https://tachibanayu24.com/me.schema.json

## Interests

Startups, Fitness, Sauna, Cooking, Rabbits, Shogi, Real Estate, Stock Market, Comedy, AI in Large Industries

## Language

This site supports both English and Japanese. Content is managed through me.json with language-specific fields.
